trans-unit.source: The base class for the configuration converter types.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase> is the base class for the converter configuration types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase>是組態型別轉換子的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: These are types that convert strings, found in the configuration file, to and from the related strongly typed properties.
trans-unit.target: 以下是將字串轉換的類型，但找到組態檔中，與相關的強型別屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples show how to derive from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase> class to create a custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> converter type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示如何從衍生<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase>類別來建立自訂<xref:System.TimeSpan>轉換器類型。

trans-unit.source: Also, the examples show how to use this type in a custom section.
trans-unit.target: 此外，範例會示範如何在自訂 > 一節中使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> converter type from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂<xref:System.TimeSpan>轉換器類型從<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define a custom section that uses the previous custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> converter.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用先前自訂的自訂區段<xref:System.TimeSpan>轉換器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and modify a configuration file using the previous custom section.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和修改組態檔使用自訂前一節。

trans-unit.source: The following is a configuration excerpt as used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例為上一個範例所使用的組態摘錄。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase" /> class.

Because you normally use the converter types provided by the system, the only time you need the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.%23ctor%2A> constructor is when you must create your own conversion type.
trans-unit.target: 因為您通常會使用系統提供的轉換器類型，唯一時，您必須<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.%23ctor%2A>建構函式是您必須建立您自己的轉換類型時。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object used for type conversions.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to convert from.
Determines whether the conversion is allowed.
<see langword="true" /> if the conversion is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A> method determines whether a conversion can be performed on strongly typed properties to obtain value strings used in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法會判斷是否可以強型別屬性，以取得組態檔中所使用的值字串上執行的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows how to override the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to create a custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> converter type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法來建立自訂<xref:System.TimeSpan>轉換器類型。

trans-unit.source: Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例會示範如何自訂 > 一節中使用這個類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object used for type conversion.
The type to convert to.
Determines whether the conversion is allowed.
<see langword="true" /> if the conversion is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A> method determines whether the strings contained in the configuration file can be converted to the related strongly typed properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法可判斷組態檔中所含的字串是否可以轉換成相關的強型別屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows how to override the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to create a custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> converter type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法來建立自訂<xref:System.TimeSpan>轉換器類型。

trans-unit.source: Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例會示範如何自訂 > 一節中使用這個類型。
